Articles.Content: Even though my KSP is fully up-to-date, the planet textures have not been improved. They are still the old legacy textures. How do I fix this?

Check the settings file, there’s an option called ‘unsupported_use_legacy_shader’ which if True will use the old terrain, set it to False if it isn’t False already. If you’re running KSP version 1.9.1 try turning the terrain shader option up in the in-game options from the main menu > settings > graphics, this might cause reduced performance though.
